rule.name: MU_RyderYardCheck
rule.definition:
load(local!vehicleSelected:fn!false(), local!newVehicle:2, local!searchPressed:fn!false(), local!vehicleAdded:fn!false(), local!totalCount:20, local!vehicleNumbers:enumerate(local!totalCount)+331866, local!vehicleNames:{"Charlie","Kimberly Billing Inc.","","Company Use","Kimberlee Jones Interior Dsgn.","COASTAL CAISSON CORP.","Kimberly Billing Inc.","Kimberly Gomez","WASTEWATER SOLIDS MGMT","RTR 395 #2SM FOR JOSELYN","carla","kim retest issue 138","AAA AUTO CLUB SOUTH","District Transfer","COMMERCIAL RENTAL","Kimberly's Floor Service","Best Janitorial Service Inc.","Frank's Moving Company","COASTAL CAISSON CORP."}, local!yardLoc:repeat(local!totalCount,null), local!washReq:toboolean(repeat(local!totalCount,null)), local!fuelReq:toboolean(repeat(local!totalCount,null)),
